post.body: Yes! i'm grabbing a book and i'm going to try to forget all of this every happened to me! Great chatting! Nightnight!
BRRR. i'm officially grossed out. After the day i've just had, that is quite a feat.
Thanks anyways! Can't burn it now, i'll probably need to sleep on it. Flip!
i do have the fireplace available. No whiskey, but what about Guru's gin?? or kid's juicepaks?
thanks for the lead. Now can you tell me what to do with my futon? ick.
yeah, i'm a luddite. my inhouse guru @adamshore hasn't set me up with all those fancy thingamajiggers.
i swear i have washed every single piece of linen. Even my Fox and the Hound blanket from when i was a kid!
i'm with you somedays. We nicknamed the puppy, Kijiji.
Yes, it's really quite peaceful and spiritual...if you forget about all the barf that went into creating this day.
i would need the name of the person who lived in Cheticamp area. That should be good to start.
Wow, that sounds like an amazing drink!
Greetings fellow Bedfordite! How deep's the snow in your part of town?
Holy crow, we're out of Pedialyte!
Everyone including all the dogs, are asleep. It's only me, a roaring fire, my 'puter and the sound of my washing machine. :S
Maybe that's what happened! My house got hacked! Cause there's an awful pile of viruses going around this place!!
There's an awful lot of hacking going on. Don't these guys take a vacation ever? i have a job for them,Cleaning my SICKhouse. That'll show'm
Taking some precious 'Life time' to read a book w/ my baby girl while she is still the little girl that she is right now. No time to waste.
Just loaded up indoor woodpile. No one to take Neptune tix. Starts in 1 hour. What a waste.
i'm so bored, it's beyond words. If i have no more housework til 2010, i'll be ok.
After 3 different grocery stores, i'm back to the land of Plague. Two anniversary tickets to Neptune play for tonight...gonezo.
